mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 2M-1, northeast wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Nelson, Jacob Paul [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: French phrase that appears to translate to 'I am very horny;' note similar graffiti but in German, in photo 5 of lower shelf surface of this carrel; note also that an acute accent is used in "trés" rather than the standard grave accent (i.e. should be 'très'). [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sex
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
